alert.note: Alert for Eastern San Juan Mountains Above 10000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 26 at 11:43PM MST until December 29 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM MST MONDAY THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... ...WINTER STORM WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT MIDNIGHT MST TONIGHT... * WHAT...The winter storm warning will expire tonight. A new winter storm watch goes in effect late tomorrow morning, and snowfall amounts of 12 to 24 inches will be possible Winds could gust as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Eastern San Juan Mountains Above 10000 Feet County. * WHEN...From 11 AM MST Monday through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 15 below zero could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Eastern San Juan Mountains Above 10000 Ft
